title: Intermittent CI failure: project.assets.json already exists
body:
CI and PR builds of our repo fail far too often with an error like [this](https://dev.azure.com/dnceng/public/_build/results?buildId=452982&view=logs&j=6772b272-ab79-59eb-8cca-405ab5c4d2b5&t=77aa7d44-8ac6-58f9-07fa-1bd408749035&l=149).

```
##[error]stage1/bin/bootstrap/netcoreapp2.1/MSBuild/NuGet.targets(123,5): error : The file '/home/vsts/work/1/s/artifacts/obj/MSBuild/project.assets.json' already exists.
```
